question_content.barrons:question: People accustomed to thinking that the human lifespan (i)__________ the outer bound of animal longevity tend to dismiss tales of musket balls being found in the shells of living turtles. Leading (ii)__________ Samantha Romney, however, argues that while such stories may be apocryphal, some turtles do indeed exhibit a phenomenon known as "negligible (iii)__________ ," showing no signs of aging even as they pass the two-century mark.
